posts.post_content:
All cards are sold. Many thanks!

Thank you for looking and if you have any questions email me at: [url]mpeich@comcast.net[/url].

An email, indicating that you want a card, takes precedence over PMs or posts in this thread.

Payment by check is preferred and if you are a repeat buyer the card will be sent immediately after you claim it. New buyer checks will have to clear before the card is sent.

Shipping is $6.00 for insured first class.

Enjoy the cards,
Mike

One bump before the National where I can deliver the card you buy!

Cheers, Mike
